last_episode_to_air.name: Christmas
last_episode_to_air.overview: Set against a backdrop of the local nativity play, some shocking news sets Adam and Michael against each other. By the end of this episode, things will never be the same for Marley and her ghosts.

name: Marley's Ghosts
overview: Marley has a rare gift that comes with mixed blessings - she can talk to the dead, who sadly now include both her husband Adam, her lover Michael and her vicar… Awkward.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Series two, and scatty magistrate Marley still hasn’t got the hang of other people not being able to see her unhelpful undead companions.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: So begins a bizarre ménage-a-quatre, with Adam, Michael and the vicar all moving in, albeit in ghostly form, to Marley's haunt, sorry, home. Naturally Marley isn't crazy about this new set up - but all looks rosy again when the ghosts convince her that they're just a figment of her overwrought imagination, and for a moment she really believes they've gone. But, no, these apparitions ain't evaporating - they're going nowhere.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Marley brings in a ghost hunter, but the ghosts aren't making things easy, getting caught up in a robbery and convincing Marley she's going insane.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Vicar develops an infatuation with the neighbour's son. Michael wants to give back to the world. Adam learns of a daughter he never knew about.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Chest
episodes.overview: Marley moves into her new home and receives a visit from a handsome policeman and the local Neighbourhood Watch, while her ex-lover Michael's past comes back to haunt him.

episodes.name: Fit
episodes.overview: Marley's attempts to befriend her neighbours are disrupted by her wayward niece. Adam, Michael and the Vicar have a night out.

episodes.name: Blind Sided
episodes.overview: A courtroom drama causes Marley to try and be a better person, but showing emotion doesn't prove easy. Meanwhile a new ghost in town offers Adam, Michael and the Vicar a chance of a new life away from Marley.

episodes.name: The Art Teacher
episodes.overview: Marley and Adam go to war over Marley's determination to find someone actually alive to love. Meanwhile, a surprise nude painting causes problems for the gang.

episodes.name: Carly
episodes.overview: When Marley realises her childhood imaginary friend, Carly, was actually a ghost, we meet a new addition to the gang. But will her attraction to Adam break Marley's world apart?

episodes.name: Christmas
episodes.overview: Set against a backdrop of the local nativity play, some shocking news sets Adam and Michael against each other. By the end of this episode, things will never be the same for Marley and her ghosts.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Series two, and scatty magistrate Marley still hasn’t got the hang of other people not being able to see her unhelpful undead companions.
